handleUserTokenTransfers(address,address.details: This function will be called when either user is transferring the tokens to other account, or is receiving tokens from other tokens.

params.amount: the amount that is being transferred
params.tokenId: the id of the token that is being transferred

params.index: index of the contract to remove from the list

setOwner(address).details: This function takes in the address of new owner and sets it to the contract
